name: WebdriverIO
description: Project  to run WebdriverIO tests with Appium to test native applications on iOS and Android

scripts.test-local: npm run report-ci && npm run delete && npx wdio config/wdio.conf.ts --mochaOpts.grep 'TEST' && npm run allure-report
scripts.test-docker: npm run report-ci && npm run delete && npx wdio config/wdio.Docker.conf.ts --mochaOpts.grep 'TEST' && npm run allure-report
scripts.test-docker-smoke: npm run report-ci && npx wdio config/wdio.Docker.conf.ts --mochaOpts.grep 'SMOKE' && npm run allure-report
scripts.test-local-smoke: npm run report-ci && npx wdio config/wdio.conf.ts --mochaOpts.grep 'SMOKE' && npm run allure-report
scripts.multi-browser: npm run report-ci && npx wdio config/wdio.conf.cross-browser.ts && npm run allure-report

author: Wim Selles <wim@wswebcreation.nl>
